page.title: 12RECREATION IN TILSTON
page.content: The village has a{recreation field}for football and village events. The adults play football against other teams but the children either play at school or in the Malpas Colts. {Badminton}is played by all age groups in the Village Hall. In the pubs adults can play{darts}and{pool.}A new {fishing club}has been formed to fish in the local ponds. To play cricket, bowls and tennis we need to go to the town of Malpas. To play golf or swim we need to go to Whitchurch. Our nearest sports hall is in Malpas. The "Evergreens" enjoy bingo, dominoes, card games and gardening. Many enjoy discos, dancing, theatre and walking. Many people cycle through the village and Tilston is part of a{car leisure {drive.
